attributes.additional_details:
Make it mandatory for bus stops to use the bus lay-by system.

More and more you see bus stops appear on pavements but with no thought given to where the bus will stop, other road users and the congestion that these pop up bus stops cause.

If the lay-by system is adhered busses can safely pull into its designated pull in and the road traffic can continue to flow.

Let’s limit needless congestion, its bad enough!
